alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 1:20AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Chickasaw, southeastern Yalobusha and Calhoun Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 120 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Coffeeville, or 17 miles south of Water Valley, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Houston, Bruce, Calhoun City, Vardaman, Derma, Pittsboro, Pyland, Houlka, New Houlka, Big Creek, Thorn, Reid, Loyd, Ellard, Thelma, Atlanta, Tyson, Gums, Retreat and Spearman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi.
